team.six.androidchat.Sending_Recieving

Class Async_Get_Sessions

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.String,java.lang.Void,java.lang.String>
      • team.six.androidchat.Sending_Recieving.Async_Get_Sessions

  • public class Async_Get_Sessions
extends android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.String,java.lang.Void,java.lang.String>

    This class contains a method doBackground which overrides a method in the AsyncTask class.

    This method allows us to preform operations in the background without interupting the apps user interface.

    The doBackground method submits an HTTP get request. If the request runs through, the text of the page is returned in a string

    Author:
    Cesar Avalos, Alec Knutsen
    See Also:
    AsyncTask
